// Settings
About the app
License The app is completely open source and licensed under GPL3.
Image quality Set the image quality. Higher quality results in (much) bigger PDF sizes.
Backup Do you want to backup pdf files before manipulating, e.g. deleting or adding pages?
Custom directory Let empty to use the default directory (\"/Android/data/de.baumann.pdf/\"). Enter the path to your desired folder on your sdcard. The path must begin and end with \"/\" like \"/Download/PDF/\". If the desired directory does not exist, it will be generated automatically.
Donate If you like the app, you can donate to me via Paypal.
Changelog See what\'s new … (will open a website)
Help dialog Show the help dialog on start.
App info Open via the system settings the app info of the app. There you can, depending on your Android version, manage several things (Storage, network traffic, permissions, …).
